analysis: Market analysis indicates positive momentum favoring buyers. RSI at 77.11 indicates overbought territory, suggesting caution for long positions. Money Flow Index at 71.03 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD histogram positive with bullish crossover confirmed. Price maintaining above Bollinger middle band, uptrend intact. Price structure supports bullish continuation with MA and SAR confirmation. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias.
